item.title: Recommended Reading
item.description: This post collects links to various articles, blogs and videos, mainly for my own reference. Clojure Clojure for the Brave and True by Daniel Higginbotham (Youtube) Kolmogorov music by Christopher Ford Libraries clojure.spec - Rationale and Overview by Rich Hickey spec Guide original author: Alex Miller core.match core.async specter Load Testing Coordinated Backoff (PDF) How NOT to Measure Latency by Matt Schuetze & Gil Tene Everything You Know About Latency Is Wrong by Tyler Treat
